title: Dragon's tongue
creator_credit: Maija Rove, Asian Studies Council, Griffith University and ABC-TV (Australia)
brief_description: A series of lessons in the Chinese language intended for high school students who have studied Chinese for two years. Each lesson includes some simple vocabulary, calligraphy, brief dramatisations which utilise the vocabulary and short sections on life in modern China. Introduced by Colin McKerras.
creator_credit_for_label: Maija Rove, Asian Studies Council, Griffith University and ABC-TV (Australia)
